QuestData.Title: Learn to Ride in Durotar
QuestData.Description: This pamphlet advertising riding training and mount purchases was sent from Xar'Ti.$B$BXar'Ti can be found at Sen'jin Village in southern Durotar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the pamphlet to Xar'Ti at Sen'jin Village in southern Durotar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ah, you received my letter? Good.
QuestData.RewardText: So, shall we begin your Apprentice Riding training?
